name: wish-list-backend
description: frontend of the christmas wish list 2020 project

scripts.push:backend: git add . && git commit -m heroku_add && git push
scripts.push:heroku: cd .. && git subtree push --prefix wish-list-backend heroku main
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && npm run copy:build && npm run push:backend && npm run remote:heroku && npm run push:heroku
scripts.push:full: npm run build:ui && npm run copy:build && npm run push:backend

author: HVKukkonen
